fullText: This production has been mounted with the kind of lavish, no-expense-spared attention to period detail that makes you feel as if you've been invited to the swankiest theme party ever thrown.
dtliExcerpt: This production has been mounted with the kind of lavish, no-expense-spared attention to period detail that makes you feel as if you've been invited to the swankiest theme party ever thrown.
bwwExcerpt: Perhaps best of all, this 'Century' brings Ms. Chenoweth and Mr. Gallagher back to Broadway, where they can demonstrate the subtleties of being larger than life. These fine performers have been largely confined to television screens in recent years. And they grab the chance to chew (and devour) some real live scenery - and in Ms. Chenoweth's case, hit pretty much every note on the scale, musical and otherwise - with the ecstatic vengeance of genies let out of their bottles.
